name: Hyper-D Prototype
description:
Experience Hyper-D!

A fast paced!
Retro future!
Driving experience!

The only way to keep moving is to destroy every car in your path! 

If anyone is interested in us further developing Hyper-D by adding more levels, better visuals or if you have any suggestions, let us know in the comments.

How To Play
  • Collect hyper speed from other cars, and add time to your clock.  See if you can make it to the end before the time runs out.
